price: 95. Jie tarė: „Prisiekiame Allahu, be abejonės tu esi senoje klaidoje.“
arabic: قَالُواْ تَٱللَّهِ إِنَّكَ لَفِي ضَلَٰلِكَ ٱلۡقَدِيمِ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū tal-lahi innaka lafī ḍalālika al-qadīmi
